title: [Epidemiology] Projected Health Outcomes Associated With 3 US Supreme Court Decisions in 2022 on COVID-19 Workplace Protections, Handgun-Carry Restrictions, and Abortion Rights: 3 Supreme Court decisions in 2022 could lead to substantial harms to public health

[Health] The high-frequency repeated TMS over the left dorsolateral prefrontal cortex appears to be the most promising noninvasive brain stimulation treatment for improving cognitive performance after stroke
